variants.name: lunar
variants.description: These wings shimmer with a light reminiscent of the moon's glow. Worn by the revered Celestial Navigators, they guide souls across the night skies, charting courses by the stars.

variants.name: amber
variants.description: Infused with the warmth of the setting sun, these wings capture the last light of day, offering protection and guidance during twilight travels.

variants.name: black
variants.description: Dark as a solar eclipse, these wings are a rare sight, enveloping their bearer in shadows and mystery, perfect for those who operate under the cover of darkness.

variants.name: blue
variants.description: Mirroring the deep blue of the ocean, these wings are favored by sea voyagers and stormcallers alike, harnessing the power of the vast waters.

variants.name: bluegray
variants.description: These wings carry the hues of a stormy sky, granting their bearer the ability to command the winds and rains, guiding storms away from or towards lands as needed.

variants.name: bright_green
variants.description: Bright green and vibrant, these wings are imbued with the essence of spring's renewal, accelerating growth and healing in their wake.

variants.name: bronze
variants.description: Forged from the alloys of lost civilizations, these wings carry tales of forgotten ages, providing wisdom and strength from the ancients.

variants.name: brown
variants.description: These wings blend into the wilderness, offering their wearer camouflage and a deep connection with the terrestrial forces.

variants.name: ceramic
variants.description: Crafted from a ceramic that gleams like polished alabaster, these wings are a masterpiece of art, offering beauty and an unusual, smooth flight.

variants.name: forest
variants.description: Embodying the spirit of the forest, these wings allow their bearer to move unseen through trees, whispering secrets of the woods.

variants.name: gold
variants.description: Gleaming with the brilliance of pure gold, these wings reflect the first light of dawn, revitalizing all those who bask in their glow.

variants.name: green
variants.description: These emerald wings are bathed in the essence of lush meadows, healing and soothing the spirits of all who follow in their path.

variants.name: iron
variants.description: These iron wings are as sturdy as the armor of ancient warriors, providing unmatched protection and a fierce silhouette against the sky.

variants.name: lavender
variants.description: With a soothing lavender hue, these wings are cherished by healers and peacekeepers, spreading tranquility wherever they glide.

variants.name: light
variants.description: These wings, almost translucent, capture and amplify light, guiding the lost and forlorn to safety during the darkest nights.

variants.name: lunar
variants.description: Bathed in the soft silver light of the moon, these wings grant the power of night vision and silent flight, perfect for nocturnal escapades.

variants.name: maroon
variants.description: This deep maroon pair of wings is favored by dusk wanderers and twilight poets, enhancing their muses as the sun sets.

variants.name: navy
variants.description: The navy hue of these wings holds the mysteries of the deep sea, offering insights and dreams of the oceanic abyss.

variants.name: orange
variants.description: Blazing like a sunset, these orange wings are imbued with the fiery essence of the sun, energizing all who see them.

variants.name: pale_green
variants.description: These pale green wings flutter with the freshness of spring, reviving the weary and bringing new growth in their wake.

variants.name: pink
variants.description: These wings carry the gentle hues of spring cherry blossoms, inspiring love and friendship among those who encounter their bearer.

variants.name: purple
variants.description: Enshrouded in the enigmatic aura of twilight, these purple wings are sought after by mystics and seers for their divinatory powers.

variants.name: red
variants.description: These red wings crackle with the fury of a tempest, bestowing upon their wearer the ferocity and command of a storm.

variants.name: rose
variants.description: Colored like the first blush of dawn, these rose wings awaken hope and renewal, heralding the start of new endeavors.

variants.name: silver
variants.description: These silver wings glisten under the moonlight, providing clarity and illumination, making them a favorite among lunar priests and priestesses.

variants.name: sky
variants.description: Reflecting the color of a clear day's sky, these wings offer freedom and perspective, lifting their bearer to new heights.

variants.name: teal
variants.description: These teal wings ripple with the tranquility of ocean waves, soothing the soul and carrying secrets from the deep.

variants.name: white
variants.description: Pure as driven snow, these white wings cool the air around them, offering protection from heat and bringing a winter's calm.

variants.name: yellow
variants.description: Bright as the early morning sun, these yellow wings fill the air with melodies of birdsong, awakening the day with joy.

variants.name: zombie_green
variants.description: These unusual zombie green wings are imbued with a toxic essence, warding off foes with their noxious fumes, yet bewitching flora with their fertile touch.
